channel.title: Comments on: The Mist
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Me
item.dc:creator: Me
item.description: I just saw this movie on Sunday, I really enjoyed it lol I thought it had it's funny moments and the ending kicked ass...Like a kick in the balls to Hollywood...:P
item.content:encoded:
I just saw this movie on Sunday, I really enjoyed it lol
I thought it had it’s funny moments and the ending kicked ass…Like a kick in the balls to Hollywood…:P

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I remember playing the text adventure a long time ago. I think it was on the Apple. Yeah, it was pretty hard. There was also a Rambo text adventure game that came out around the same time.
item.content:encoded: I remember playing the text adventure a long time ago. I think it was on the Apple. Yeah, it was pretty hard. There was also a Rambo text adventure game that came out around the same time.

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description:
Thanks for the comments... this was a movie I was interested in checking out. Now I think I'll probably wait to rent it on DVD.
Did you ever play the text adventure? I downloaded it from the Underdogs site and tried it out. I got frustrated with it pretty quickly!
Jeff
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the comments… this was a movie I was interested in checking out. Now I think I’ll probably wait to rent it on DVD.

Did you ever play the text adventure? I downloaded it from the Underdogs site and tried it out. I got frustrated with it pretty quickly!

Jeff
